Detailed Description

The iSql:: interface declares the SQL-Server-Connection.

Patrick Kracht <patrick.kracht@googlemail.com> Thorsten Moll <thorsten.moll@googlemail.com>

query sends querystring to server and returns queryid

Parameters:
string querystring
int start retrieving records from record
int limits number of record returned
Returns:
mixed returns MYSQL result resource on success, TRUE if no rows were returned, or FALSE on error

iSql.query_all ( $  qstring  ) 

queryall sends querystring to server and returns whole result as array

Parameters:
string querystring
int start retrieving records from record
int limits number of record returned
const the type of array that is to be fetched (default) MYSQL_ASSOC, MYSQL_NUM, MYSQL_BOTH
Returns:
array returns whole array containing all records
public

Author:
patrick.kracht, thorsten.moll

iSql.unbuffered_query ( $  qstring  ) 

unbuffered_query (like query, but unbuffered)

Parameters:
string querystring
int start retrieving records from record
int set low-priority commands (1) or not (0)
int limits number of record returned
Returns:
mixed returns MYSQL result resource on success, TRUE if no rows were returned, or FALSE on error
public

iSql.fetch_array ( $  query_id = -1  ) 

fetch a result row as an associative array, a numeric array, or both

Parameters:
mixed query resource
const the type of array that is to be fetched (default) MYSQL_ASSOC, MYSQL_NUM, MYSQL_BOTH
Returns:
mixed returns an array that corresponds to the fetched row, or FALSE if there are no more rows
public
